name: WORKORAMA
description:
An electrifying experience got you split between the REAL and the ARCADE world. 📖 Setting

After an exhausting day at work. A man’s conscience gets stuck in an arcade machine game. Its upon you to finish the levels and escape back to reality.

➡️ Find a way out of the arcade and escape back to reality.

➡️ Interact with the game’s environment switching between different points of view.

➡️ Observe patterns, collect, manipulate and store objects in your inventory.

Disclaimer: Not all 3D model where made by the team. This is a university project made in Unity.

TEAM: 

  • Ana Santos Linkedin
  • Joana Silva Linkedin
  • Pedro Torres Linkedin
